main event: A civilian observed a disc-shaped UFO with a bright light hovering above the ground in Pelion's Rapids, Minnesota on March 8, 1967.
interesting points: The UFO hovered approximately 50 feet above the ground and was about 150 yards away from the observer., The object emitted a humming sound while it was stationary., The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes before the UFO accelerated rapidly and disappeared., The observer, M. E. Minnesotan, was watching television when he first noticed the light outside., The report includes a sketch drawn by the observer, detailing the appearance of the UFO, but no photographs were provided.
sighted object: a disc-shaped UFO with a bright light
witness description: M. E. Minnesotan, a 39-year-old laundry worker, illiterate, from Minneapolis, Minnesota
